DOC.brief_summary: This project evaluate brief intervention emergency department ( ED ) adolescents present suicide attempt . The intervention aim capitalize opportunity offer ED visit deliver effective intervention , improve adherence follow-up care , decrease risk repeat suicide attempt , improve clinical functioning outcome .
